verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came again unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H559>say<s%> unto the <S%H5057>prince<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyrus<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Because thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> is lifted <S%H1361>up<s%>, and thou hast <S%H559>said<s%>, I am a <S%H410>God<s%>, I <S%H3427>sit<s%> in the <S%H4186>seat<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, in the <S%H3820>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas<s%>; yet thou art a <S%H120>man<s%>, and not <S%H410>God<s%>, though thou <S%H5414>set<s%> thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> as the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>: midst: Heb. heart
Behold, thou art <S%H2450>wiser<s%> than <S%H1840>Daniel<s%>; there is no <S%H5640>secret<s%> that they can <S%H6004>hide<s%> from thee:

With thy <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and with thine <S%H8394>understanding<s%> thou hast <S%H6213>gotten<s%> thee <S%H2428>riches<s%>, and hast <S%H6213>gotten<s%> <S%H2091>gold<s%> and <S%H3701>silver<s%> into thy <S%H214>treasures<s%>:

By thy <S%H7230>great<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and by thy <S%H7404>traffick<s%> hast thou <S%H7235>increased<s%> thy <S%H2428>riches<s%>, and thine <S%H3824>heart<s%> is lifted <S%H1361>up<s%> because of thy <S%H2428>riches<s%>: thy great: Heb. the greatness of thy wisdom
Therefore thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Because thou hast <S%H5414>set<s%> thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> as the <S%H3824>heart<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>;

Behold, therefore I will <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H2114>strangers<s%> upon thee, the <S%H6184>terrible<s%> of the <S%H1471>nations<s%>: and they shall <S%H7324>draw<s%> their <S%H2719>swords<s%> against the <S%H3308>beauty<s%> of thy <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, and they shall <S%H2490>defile<s%> thy <S%H3314>brightness<s%>.

They shall bring thee <S%H3381>down<s%> to the <S%H7845>pit<s%>, and thou shalt <S%H4191>die<s%> the <S%H4463>deaths<s%> of them that are <S%H2491>slain<s%> in the <S%H3820>midst<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas<s%>.

Wilt thou <S%H559>yet<s%> <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him that <S%H2026>slayeth<s%> thee, I am <S%H430>God<s%>? but thou shalt be a <S%H120>man<s%>, and no <S%H410>God<s%>, in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of him that <S%H2490>slayeth<s%> thee. of him that slayeth: or, of him that woundeth

Thou shalt <S%H4191>die<s%> the <S%H4194>deaths<s%> of the <S%H6189>uncircumcised<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H2114>strangers<s%>: for I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.
Moreover the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, take <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H7015>lamentation<s%> upon the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyrus<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto him, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Thou sealest <S%H2856>up<s%> the <S%H8508>sum<s%>, <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H2451>wisdom<s%>, and <S%H3632>perfect<s%> in <S%H3308>beauty<s%>.

Thou hast been in <S%H5731>Eden<s%> the <S%H1588>garden<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>; every <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> was thy <S%H4540>covering<s%>, the <S%H124>sardius<s%>, <S%H6357>topaz<s%>, and the <S%H3095>diamond<s%>, the <S%H8658>beryl<s%>, the <S%H7718>onyx<s%>, and the <S%H3471>jasper<s%>, the <S%H5601>sapphire<s%>, the <S%H5306>emerald<s%>, and the <S%H1304>carbuncle<s%>, and <S%H2091>gold<s%>: the <S%H4399>workmanship<s%> of thy <S%H8596>tabrets<s%> and of thy <S%H5345>pipes<s%> was <S%H3559>prepared<s%> in thee in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that thou wast <S%H1254>created<s%>. sardius: or, ruby beryl: or, chrysolite emerald: or, chrysoprase

Thou art the <S%H4473>anointed<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%> that <S%H5526>covereth<s%>; and I have <S%H5414>set<s%> thee so: thou wast upon the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>; thou hast walked up and <S%H1980>down<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H68>stones<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%>.
Thou wast <S%H8549>perfect<s%> in thy <S%H1870>ways<s%> from the <S%H3117>day<s%> that thou wast <S%H1254>created<s%>, till <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> was <S%H4672>found<s%> in thee.

By the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of thy <S%H7404>merchandise<s%> they have <S%H4390>filled<s%> the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of thee with <S%H2555>violence<s%>, and thou hast <S%H2398>sinned<s%>: therefore I will cast thee as <S%H2490>profane<s%> out of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>: and I will <S%H6>destroy<s%> thee, O <S%H5526>covering<s%> <S%H3742>cherub<s%>, from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H68>stones<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%>.

Thine <S%H3820>heart<s%> was lifted <S%H1361>up<s%> because of thy <S%H3308>beauty<s%>, thou hast <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> thy <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> by reason <S%H5921>of<s%> thy <S%H3314>brightness<s%>: I will <S%H7993>cast<s%> thee to the <S%H776>ground<s%>, I will <S%H5414>lay<s%> thee <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%>, that they may <S%H7200>behold<s%> thee.

Thou hast <S%H2490>defiled<s%> thy <S%H4720>sanctuaries<s%> by the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of thine <S%H5771>iniquities<s%>, by the <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> of thy <S%H7404>traffick<s%>; therefore will I bring <S%H3318>forth<s%> a <S%H784>fire<s%> from the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of thee, it shall <S%H398>devour<s%> thee, and I will <S%H5414>bring<s%> thee to <S%H665>ashes<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of all them that <S%H7200>behold<s%> thee.

All they that <S%H3045>know<s%> thee among the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall be <S%H8074>astonished<s%> at thee: thou shalt be a <S%H1091>terror<s%>, and <S%H369>never<s%> shalt thou be any <S%H5704>more<s%> <S%H5769><s%>. a terror: Heb. terrors
Again the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,
<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H7760>set<s%> thy <S%H6440>face<s%> against <S%H6721>Zidon<s%>, and <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> against it,

And <S%H559>say<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Behold, I am against thee, O <S%H6721>Zidon<s%>; and I will be <S%H3513>glorified<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of thee: and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, when I shall have <S%H6213>executed<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> in her, and shall be <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> in her.

For I will <S%H7971>send<s%> into her <S%H1698>pestilence<s%>, and <S%H1818>blood<s%> into her <S%H2351>streets<s%>; and the <S%H2491>wounded<s%> shall be <S%H5307>judged<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of her by the <S%H2719>sword<s%> upon her on every <S%H5439>side<s%>; and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

And there shall be no more a <S%H3992>pricking<s%> <S%H5544>brier<s%> unto the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, nor any <S%H3510>grieving<s%> <S%H6975>thorn<s%> of all that are round <S%H5439>about<s%> them, that <S%H7590>despised<s%> them; and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>.

Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; When I shall have <S%H6908>gathered<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H5971>people<s%> among whom they are <S%H6327>scattered<s%>, and shall be <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> in them in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, then shall they <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in their <S%H127>land<s%> that I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.

And they shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> <S%H983>safely<s%> therein, and shall <S%H1129>build<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%>, and <S%H5193>plant<s%> <S%H3754>vineyards<s%>; yea, they shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> with <S%H983>confidence<s%>, when I have <S%H6213>executed<s%> <S%H8201>judgments<s%> upon all those that <S%H7590>despise<s%> them round <S%H5439>about<s%> them; and they shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>. safely: or, with confidence despise: or, spoil
